message: You approach the table and pick up the note. It reads: "Welcome to my lair. I have a task for you. Find the lost relic and bring it back to me. Be careful, as danger awaits you in these halls."

You read the note and it reveals that the lost relic is located somewhere in the dungeon. You must explore the dungeon and find the relic before it falls into the wrong hands. Be wary of traps and monsters that may stand in your way. Good luck!
